articles.title: Dassault Systèmes and NVIDIA Partner to Build Industrial AI Platform Powering Virtual Twins
articles.summary: Dassault Systèmes (Euronext Paris: FR0014003TT8, DSY.PA) and NVIDIA today announced a long-term strategic partnership to establish a shared industrial architecture for mission-critical artificial intelligence across industries.

articles.title: NVIDIA Sets Conference Call for Fourth-Quarter Financial Results
articles.summary: NVIDIA will host a conference call on Wednesday, February 25, at 2 p.m. PT (5 p.m. ET) to discuss its financial results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year 2026, which ended January 25, 2026.

articles.title: NVIDIA and CoreWeave Strengthen Collaboration to Accelerate Buildout of AI Factories
articles.summary: NVIDIA (Nasdaq: NVDA) and CoreWeave, Inc. (Nasdaq: CRWV) today announced an expansion of their long-standing complementary relationship to enable CoreWeave to accelerate the buildout of more than 5 gigawatts of AI factories by 2030 to advance AI adoption at global scale.
